mapper.update: update u_resource a set name=#{res.name}, displayText=#{res.displayText}, groups=#{res.group}, smallGroup=#{res.smallGroup}, parentId=#{res.parentId}, orderNum=#{res.orderNum}, resType=#{res.resourceType}, elementId=#{res.elementId} where a.id=#{res.id}
mapper.delete: delete from u_role_x_resource where roleId=#{roleId} and resId=#{resId}
delete from u_user_x_resource where userId=#{userId} and resId=#{resId}
mapper.select: select id,name,displayText,groups as `group`,smallGroup,parentId,orderNum,resType as resourceType,elementId from u_resource
select a.id,name,displayText,groups as `group`,smallGroup,parentId,orderNum,resType as resourceType,elementId from u_resource a inner join u_role_x_resource b on a.id=b.resId where b.roleId=#{roleId}

select a.id,name,displayText,groups as `group`,smallGroup,parentId,orderNum,resType as resourceType,elementId from u_resource a inner join u_role_x_resource b on a.id=b.resId where b.roleId=#{roleId} and a.groups=#{group}
select a.id,name,displayText,groups as `group`,smallGroup,parentId,orderNum,resType as resourceType,elementId from u_resource a inner join u_user_x_resource b on a.id=b.resId where b.userId=#{userId}
